item.title: RMF Tool
item.description: The rmftool is written in python and available on: Github (An introduction and short examples are hosted in the repository.) Pipy A paper, accepted at the Tools for Stochastic Modelling and Evaluation workshop of IFIP Performance 2021 and can be found here: Link To install the package simply The package / tool can be easily installed by using pip: pip install rmftool
